titles.title: District of Columbia Federal Immigration Compliance Act of 2025
District of Columbia Federal Immigration Compliance Act
District of Columbia Federal Immigration Compliance Act of 2025
To require the District of Columbia to comply with federal immigration laws.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 23 - 21.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. H. Rept. 119-131.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 100.

committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
